casebody.data:
Nies
v.
Town of Emerald Isle 409PA15-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 22, 2016

J. David Breemer, Keith P. Anthony, Attorneys at Law, For Nies, Gregory P., et al.

Brian E. Edes, Norwood P. Blanchard, III, Attorneys at Law, For Town of Emerald Isle.

Elliot M. Engstrom, Attorney at Law, For Civitas Institute Center for Law and Freedom.

Stephanie H. Autry, Stephanie H. Autry, George B. Autry, Jr., Attorneys at Law, For Owners' Counsel of America, et al.

Robert H. Thomas, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, For Owners' Counsel of America, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of June 2016 by Amici Curiae to Withdraw and Substitute North Carolina Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of June 2016."
